attributes.action: Fossil fuel reliance should be reduced to 0% in 10 years.
attributes.additional_details:
If you want to learn more about climate change, global warming and how you can stop it, I would recommend watching the  BBC documentary Climate Change - The Facts. It explains it all much better than I could.
https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/m00049b1
attributes.background: As highlighted by recent protests and documentaries, and backed up by the overwhelming majority of climate scientists, we are experiencing a climate emergency. Urgent and drastic action is needed to reduce the rate of global warming: reduce fossil fuels reliance to 0% over a 10 year period.
